trans-unit.source: Represents the base class from which all implementations of the Rijndael symmetric encryption algorithm must inherit.
trans-unit.target: Representa a partir do qual todas as implementações do algoritmo de encriptação simétrica Rijndael tem de herdar de classe base.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: Este algoritmo suporta comprimentos de chave de 128, 192 ou 256 bits; voltar a predefinição para 256 bits.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>-compatible).
trans-unit.target: Este algoritmo suporta tamanhos de bloco de 128, 192 ou 256 bits; voltar à 128 bits predefinição (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>-compatível).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: The Rijndael class is the predecessor of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: A classe de Rijndael é o predecessor do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>algoritmo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> algorithm instead of Rijndael.
trans-unit.target: Deve utilizar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>algoritmo em vez de Rijndael.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) in the .NET Security blog.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a entrada [diferenças entre Rijndael e AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) no blogue de segurança do .NET.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar uma instância de uma classe abstracta.

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação irá criar uma nova instância de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the protected fields of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm> to the default values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Este método inicializa os campos protegidos de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>para os valores predefinidos listados na seguinte tabela.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: |Field|Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|256| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|128| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|128|
trans-unit.target: | Campo | Valor predefinido | |-----------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|&256; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|&128; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|128|</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>

trans-unit.source: Creates a cryptographic object to perform the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto de criptografia para efetuar o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"> </xref> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael> is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael>é <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: The algorithm was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo foi utilizado com o modo Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) ativado, mas não é compatível FIPS.

trans-unit.source: Creates a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto para efetuar a implementação especificada de criptografia de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"> </xref> algoritmo.

trans-unit.source: Acceptable values for the `algName` parameter are `Rijndael` and `System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged`.
trans-unit.target: Os valores aceitáveis para a `algName` parâmetro estão `Rijndael` e `System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"></xref> to create.
trans-unit.target: O nome da implementação específico do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael"> </xref> criar.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: The algorithm described by the algName parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo descrito através de algName parâmetro foi utilizado com o modo Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) ativado, mas não é compatível FIPS.
